Annotation.note:
The paper [BIB/Buchberger_87a] is a survey paper on Bucherger's algorithm and several applications, e.g., Robot kinematics, solving polynomial systems of equations or finding implicit equations for a surface.
It discusses the following examples:
Robot-RR as ch. 3 Ellipsoid_2 as ch. 4 Ellipsoid_4 as ch. 4 Buchberger-87 as ch. 5 FourCircles as ch. 7
